name: Fappeator
description:
** Warning: Take care about your device. Play on your own risk!

In Fappeator you must shake your phone as fast as you can. Shake it while 5 seconds, Fappeator will tell you the RPM and max speed you have reached.

Log in your account and you'll be able to get achivements and participate in global rankings or agains your friends.

Shake your phone!
